actions.text:
👋🏽  Thank you for taking the time to join our survey.

Your attitudes and opinions about getting vaccinated against COVID-19 matter to us.

Please tell us:
*Will you be getting vaccinated when it's your turn?*

⚠️ This service works best when you use the buttons at the bottom of the message

Please tell us: 
*When a Covid-19 vaccine becomes available to you, will you take it?*
What was the *main* reason for your decision to get vaccinated?
Thank you for letting us know. Can you share the *main reason* why you feel this way about COVID-19 vaccines?
quick_replies: I don't think the vaccines are safe
I don't think the vaccines work
